title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 443.1 - Corporation affected
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 443.1 - Corporation affected

State Regulations

Every steam corporation having annual steam operating
revenues of $100,000 or over shall establish, provide and maintain continuing
property records of its property used wholly or partly in steam
operations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
443.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
